author: Roisin O'Connor, Roisin O'Connor
title: The best live concerts, virtual gallery tours and musical theatre to enjoy from home every weekend
description: If you're bored of streaming the same-old TV series, there's a wealth of virtual gallery tours, musical theatre, livestreamed concerts and director Q&As to enjoy from home. Roisin O'Connor shares her top picks
content:
As we sequester ourselves at home, many will likely be feeling at a loss as to how to keep themselves, and their families, entertained during the lockdown.
While wed suggest making sure you take plenty of breaks from the screen for your daily exercise, readi… [+28346 chars]
